EmailTemplate.name: 201706_Global_Nurture_FMS6.1_mih.201709_Global_Nurture_S3-1_FMS6.1_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: FMS 6.1 Update - Please Let Us Know How We Can Help!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/FMSNotice_2017.html]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
In an effort to better understand your plans to upgrade to Honeywell’s FMS 6.1 software, we’d like to learn more about how we can help.
Please take this short, one-question survey to help us understand how we can assist.
COMPLETE THE SURVEY <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/RG7665H]]>
Sincerely,
The Honeywell Aerospace Team
